title: PTI VC, Khattak meet Chaudhry brothers
content:
LAHORE, March 26 (APP): Vice Chairman Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) and Foreign Minister Makhdoom Shah Mahmood Qureshi on Saturday arrived here to meet Chaudhry brothers of PML-Q and convey an important message of Prime Minister Imran Khan.
Minister for Defence Pervez Khattak also accompanied the PTI vice-chairman. Upon arrival, the top PTI leadership was warmly received by Speaker Punjab Assembly Chaudhry Pervaiz Elahi and Federal Minister Monis Elahi. Federal minister for Housing Tariq Bashir Cheema was also present during the meeting. The meeting takes place at the residence of Chaudhry brothers.
Prior to his departure to Lahore, Qureshi said the meeting was a part of contacts with the allied parties.
